definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the effects of rapid double lumen tube intubation with rocuronium.

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate histopathologic response of transitional epithelium of the bladder to benzalkonium bromide intravesical instillation.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解膀胱移行上皮对苯扎溴铵的组织学反应。

sentences.english: Aim To establish an HPLC for determination the content of bromocriptine mesylate Tablets.

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for bacterial endotoxins test of Scopolamine Butylbromide Injection.

sentences.english: The bromination of corresponding deactivated aromatics was also studied in this paper.

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
